reference.title: derby.drda.traceDirectory property
reference.shortdesc: Indicates the location of tracing files.

section.title: Security Considerations
section.p: The Network Server will attempt to create the trace directory (and any parent directories) if they do not exist. This will require that the Java security policy for derbynet.jar permits verification of the existence of the named trace directory and all necessary parent directories. For each directory created, the policy must allow
and for the trace directory itself, the policy must allow
See "Configuring Java security" in the for information about customizing the Network Server's security policy.

section.title: Default
section.p: If the derby.system.home property has been set, it is the default. Otherwise, the default is the current directory.

section.title: Static or dynamic
section.p: Dynamic. You can change system values by using commands after the Network Server has been started.
